actor-start.eventDescription: Flat fee for starting an Actor run.

task-completed.eventDescription: Flat fee for completing the task.

listing-found.eventDescription: Fee per property listing found and returned.

monitor-created.eventDescription: Fee for creating a property monitoring configuration.

monitor-alert.eventDescription: Fee for sending alerts when monitored properties change.

fallback-extraction.eventDescription: Fee for using advanced fallback extraction methods when primary sources fail.

premium-source.eventDescription: Fee for accessing premium real estate data sources.

data-volume.eventDescription: Fee based on the volume of processed data (per 100 properties).
